nf:module.nf:name: pipeline_datapath
nf:module.nf:description: Registers for Pipeline CPU with Trace Buffer

nf:register.nf:name: sw_control_reg
nf:register.nf:description: Control Register. Bit 0: Force Reset. Bit 1: Enable Trace Capture.

nf:register.nf:name: sw_trace_rd_addr
nf:register.nf:description: Address Pointer for reading the Trace Buffer history (0-511)

nf:register.nf:name: trace_status
nf:register.nf:description: Trace Status. Bits [8:0]: Current Head Pointer. Bit 16: Buffer Full Flag.

nf:register.nf:name: trace_pc_info
nf:register.nf:description: Trace Entry Part 1. Bits [31:23]: PC. Bits [22:18]: WB Addr. Bit [17]: WB Enable.

nf:register.nf:name: trace_instr
nf:register.nf:description: Trace Entry Part 2. The 32-bit executed instruction.

nf:register.nf:name: trace_wb_lo
nf:register.nf:description: Trace Entry Part 3. Lower 32 bits of the Writeback Data.

nf:register.nf:name: trace_wb_hi
nf:register.nf:description: Trace Entry Part 4. Upper 32 bits of the Writeback Data.
